K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465a-21: grogs po de dag gis smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465a-23: gser gnas la sogs pa yul gzhan dag tu yang 'dong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465a-24: gling gzhan dag kyang lta zhing nor la sogs pa yang byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-0: khyod la sogs @465b pa bdag cag kyang rgya mtsho las rgyus te nor bsags par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-1: des de ltar bya'o zhes mnyan te dgongs ma'i gan du song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-2: ma gser gnas su 'gro'o zhes ma la dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-5: nor lta zhig khyim na dpag tu med pa yod kyi ma 'gro zhig ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-7: mi 'gro bar byas nas de'i 'og tu bza' shing gi ra bar phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-8: grogs po rnams kyis don de nyid la da dung yang gsol ba 'debs so zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-9: des de ltar bya'o zhes nas de dag gi ngag mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-10: yang song nas ma la dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-11: mas rkang pa nas bzung ste 'dug par gyur nas de ltar lan gsum byas pa'i 'og tu bza' shing gi ra ba der phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-12: grogs po rnams kyis nges par mi 'dong du mi rung ngo zhes bsgo nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-13: des yang ma la yul gzhan du 'gro'o zhes zhus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-14: mas bdog pa thams cad bsog nas rkang pa ya gcig nas bzung ste mi 'gro bar byas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-15: dus gzhan zhig na khye'u de bza' shing gi ra ba der phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-16: grogs po dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-17: khyod kyis nyes pas bdag cag kyang da dung ma dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:465b-18: da ni tshes bcu gsum la 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-0: des ma la ma byas par rgya rdzas thams cad phyir bton nas de lam du 'jug par byas @466a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-2: de'i mas sgo khar bsdad de rkang pa nas bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-4: ma 'gro zhig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-5: de khros nas ma'i mgo la 'goms te song nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-6: des grogs po rnams la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-7: rgya mtshor 'jug par ni bya na 'tsho'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-8: mi 'tshor yang gtol med kyi bdag cag kun gyis khrims brgyad gnod par bya'o zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-9: de dag gis kyang de'i dag mnyan te khrims mnos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-10: de ltar de dag rgya mtshor zhugs te dong dong ba las dbus su phyin pa dang rlung chen po langs nas gru bub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-12: byams pa mchod sbyin ni zangs kyi ral chen kha skya 'dar gyis bcad pa zhig la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-13: 'ju 'ju nas rgya mtsho mthar phyin te 'phyan cing song song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-14: grong khyer gser gyi ra ba can bza' shing gi ra ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-16: bdug spos kyis gdugs pa; me tog sil mas gtor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-17: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pa zhig mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-18: de'i nang na lha mo bzhi zhig 'thon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-19: de dag gis lag nas bzung ste nang du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-20: de nas de dag dang lo mang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466a-23: lo brgya stong phrag mang por rtse rtse nas lha mo de dag gis bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-0: 'phags @466b pa'i bu 'di ni sngan chad khyod la med pa'i yul yin gyi 'di nas phyi rol du byung ta re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-1: brgya la 'byung na'ang kha byang phyogs su bltas te byung zhig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-2: de dus gzhan zhig na de nas phyi rol tu byung ste yang 'phyan cing song song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-3: grong khyer dngul gyi ra ba can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-4: bza' shing gi ra ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-7: me tog sil mas gtor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-8: dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa zhig mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-9: de'i nang nas lha mo brgyad 'thon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-10: snga ma bzhin du rtse rtse nas de nas kyang dus gzhan zhig na phyir byung ste 'khyam 'khyam pa las grong khyer bee d'urya'i ra ba can nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-11: dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa snga ma bzhin du mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-12: de'i nang nas lha mo bcu drug 'thon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-13: de dag gis kyang de'i lag nas bzung ste nang du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-14: de dag dang yang lo brgya stong mang por rtse rtse nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-15: de nas kyang dus gzhan zhig nas phyir byung ste 'khyam 'khyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-16: grong khyer shel gyi ra ba can nas dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-17: de'i nang nas lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-18: de dag gis kyang lag nas bzung ste nang du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:466b-19: de dag dang yang snga ma bzhin du rtse rtse ba las de dag gis bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-0: 'phags pa'i bu 'di ni khyed la med @467a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-2: gnas 'di nas phyi rol du byung ta re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-3: brgya la 'byung na'ang kha byang phyogs su ltos te byung zhig ces smras pa'i 'og tu de khang pa de nas byung ste kha byang phyogs su bltas nas song song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-4: tsher ma'i nags tshal zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-5: grong khyer lcags kyi ra ba nag po can zhig mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-6: der der song song ba dang nang du phyin ma thag tu grong khyer gyi sgo 'gags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-7: ra ba'i gong du bltas na yang mtho bar gyur te mthar sgra 'jigs pa zhig kyang thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-8: de na gnas bzhin du 'di ci zhig snyam du bsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-9: ral gri 'khor lo mgo la 'khor zhing gcod pa'i mi zhig mthong nas dngangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-11: 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-12: sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi des 'di ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba'o zhes smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-14: khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-16: 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer ko sa li zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-17: bdag kyang de na ded dpon gyi bu zhig tu gyur cing 'dug 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-18: bdag grogs lnga brgyas bskor te bza' shing gi ra ba chen por phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467a-19: grogs po de dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-0: khyod kyi pha ni ded dpon yin @467b te; de dag la sogs pa bdag cag gi pha rnams yul gzhan du dong zhing nor la gsog pa yang byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-2: sing gha la'i gling la sogs pa gling gzhan dag kyang lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-3: bdag cag kyang khyod kyis gtso bo byas te yul gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-4: de dag gis mnyan te khyim du phyin nas ma la bdag grur zhugs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-6: bu khyod kyi pha yang rgya mtsho las grur zhugs te yul gzhan du song song ba las tshe 'phos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-7: bu yang khyod gcig pur zad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-8: khyim yang nor gyis gang bar yod kyi ma 'gro zhig ces nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-9: bdag gis kyang mi 'gro'o zhes ma'i dag mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-11: bzhir mas rkang pa nas bzung ste bsgo nas 'dug 'dug pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-12: dus gzhan zhig na bdag bza' shing gi ra bar phyin pa dang grogs po rnams kyis nges par 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-14: 'o na 'dong bar bya'o zhes bdag gis khas blangs te 'gro bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-15: bdag gi mas sgo khar rkang pa nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-17: nga dor bar mi rigs so zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:467b-18: bdag gis ma'i mgo la 'goms te song nas grogs po lnga brgya dang bdag cag rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin te khrims brgyad mnos nas rgya mtshor zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-1: ba las rlung chen po langs nas gru bub ste grogs po de dag ni tshe 'phos par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-2: bdag ni nyi ma du ma zhig na rgya mtsho'i mthar phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-4: grong khyer gser gyi ra ba can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-5: bza' shing gi ra ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-8: me tog sil mas gtor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-9: dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa zhig mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-10: de'i nang nas lha mo bzhi zhig 'thon pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-11: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-12: grong khyer lcags kyi ra bas bskor ba zhig mthong ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-13: bdag de'i nang du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-15: de na mi zhig kyang ral gri 'khor lo mgo la 'khor zhing 'dug pa mthong nas; bdag 'di na 'dug 'dug pa'i mgo la 'khor lo 'phos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-16: bdag ma'i tshig gis lan bzhi phyir log pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-17: khrims brgyad mnos pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas grong khyer bzhir nyi tshe ba'i mtho ris nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-18: bdag gis ma'i mgo la 'goms te song ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-19: ral gri 'khor lo mgo la 'khor zhing gcod pa 'di yin no zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468a-20: byams pa mchod sbyin gyis bsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-0: bdag gis kyang sngon las de kho na dang 'dra bar byas @468b kyi; bdag gi las rnam par smin pa'ang nye bar gnas par gyur pa lta'o snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-1: sems can dmyal ba'i mi des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-3: khyod gang nas 'ongs zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-4: byams pa mchod sbyin gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-5: 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer ta ma li pa ti zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-7: bdag gis kyang las de dag thams cad byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-8: sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-10: bdag gis kyang bar snang las sgra thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-11: khyod kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-12: ded dpon gyi bu thams pa mchod sbyin zhes bya ba las de dang 'dra bar byas pa zhig 'ong ngo zhes thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-13: byams pa mchod sbyin gyis zas su ci za zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-14: des mgo 'di nyid kyi [?] ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-15: sha dang rnag khrag 'ong ba za'o zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-16: mi de yang der tshe 'phos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-17: byams pa mchod sbyin 'jigs shing mi dga' bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-18: ma'i don du smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-20: 'jig rten bgrang du med pa thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-21: srid rtse man chad mnar med yan chad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-22: lha dang lha min lto 'phye chen po'i [?] tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-23: bde bar gyur cig sdug bsngal bdag gis blang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:468b-25: bsam pa thag pas pha ma la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-1: kyang pha ma'i rim gro bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-2: nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba 'dir skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du bdag 'di na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-3: 'jig rten na rigs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-4: grol bar gyur pa su bzhugs pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-5: de dag gis kyang bdag bskyab tu gsol zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-6: sems can dmyal ba pa 'dug 'dug pa der 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-7: yang pha ma'i don du smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-8: sems can dmyal ba mnar med mtha' nas srid rtse man chad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-9: sems can tshe 'pho'i rnam pa 'ching bas ji snyed bcings pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-10: thams cad ma lus chos dang ldan zhing bde bar 'tsho 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-11: rgan med tshe 'pho med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa thob gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-12: de skad ces brjod de bsdad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-13: 'khor lo de mgo la ma reg par steng gi nam mkha' la 'khor bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-14: de'i mas kyang gal te bdag gi sbyin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-16: bdag gis khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs byas pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu zhig yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-18: bdag gi bu gang dang gang na gnas kyang bde bar gyur cig ces rtag par smon lam btab pas de ltar zhi bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469a-19: de yang nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba de na 'dug 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-0: lo drug cu'ang ma lon par tshe @469b 'phos par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-2: rgyal po ma skyes dgra sems can dmyal ba'i tshe yongs su ma rdzogs par tshe 'phos pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-3: las kyi 'bras bu chud za ba med pa'i phyir rab bar klad pa na bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-4: de nas skabs su bab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na dad dpon gyi bu byams pa mchod sbyin zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin par sems na de ni de ltar mi lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-7: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gyi bu byams pa mchod sbyin zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-9: de lta bas na nga'i tshig la yid ches par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro yod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-10: chos dang dge 'dun la rim gro yod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-13: slob dpon la rim gro yod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-15: khyed kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-16: gang yul gzhan du song zhing bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-17: sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-19: byams pa mchod sbyin yul gzhan du song nas tshe de nyid la nyi tshe ba'i mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-20: nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba myong bar gyur pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:469b-21: de ltar yul gzhan du bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i las de lta bu ni yul gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-1: ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-2: nga la ci byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-5: slob dpon la ci byas pa de dag ni bye brag med cing mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-7: phyi ma la'ang rnam par smin pa mi mnyam pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-8: ji ltar na tshe 'di la rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-10: mnyan du yod pa na bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bshos gsol ba mi phongs pa gcig cig gis mthong nas sems mos par byas pas des bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yang bsags par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-11: rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las kyang byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-12: de nyid thar pa'i sa bon du gyur pa de thugs su chud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-14: de la rjes su yi rang su byed gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-15: de yi las ni nyams su su len pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-17: chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-19: yid ni legs par mos 'gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:470a-20: smra ba'am byed pa kun tu 'gyur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-14: gang zag gang sems can dmyal ba las tshe 'phos te sems can dmyal ba nyid du skye ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-16: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las tshe 'phos te gshin rje'i 'jig rten nyid du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-17: lha las tshe 'phos te lha nyid du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-18: bram ze be shya ka ra yang dang yang tshe 'phos shing spre'ur skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-19: sngar smos pa'i khyim bdag yang dang yang phyugs su skyes pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-20: mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag dbul po gcig tshe 'phos pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475a-21: de'i khyim sgo na glang sgal ba can zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-0: khyim bdag de sems khyim la @475b chags pas tshe 'phos nas glang de'i sgal pa'i srin bur skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-1: skyes ma thag tu bya rog gis zos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-2: yang de nyid du srin bur skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-3: de ltar de nyid du nyin gcig la lan bdun tshe 'phos shing skyes pa lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-4: 'phags pa moonggal gyi bu chen po yul ma ga dhar bsod snyoms la song song ba las khyim zhig gi sgo'i nang du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-5: khyim de na khyim bdag bud med dang bcas pa zhig pang na bu thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-6: nya sha'i byan dang bcas pa'i kha zas za zhing mdun na khyi nag po zhig 'dug pa de la nya'i rus pa 'dor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-7: de nas khyim bdag des moonggal gyi bu chen po mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-8: 'phags pa 'di na slong ba la sbyin pa su'ang ma mchis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-9: slar bzhud cig ces smras te slar log pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-10: khyim de'i sgo na yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i skyes bu mkhas pa zhig snga na 'dug 'dug pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-11: des de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-13: btsun pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-14: klu'i rgyal po dga' po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-16: lha'i pho brang rnam par rgyal ba'ang phyag g-yon pa'i mthe bos bsgul te brgya byin yang ngo mtshar du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:475b-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mig btsums pa tsam gyis bskor ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-0: bsod snyoms ma gsol bar slar @476a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-1: btang ba ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-2: de nas gnas brtan gyis de dag skyo bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-4: mi des smras pa; 'o na ngo mtshar chen po ci mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-6: 'di na khyim bdag nya sha'i byan dang bcas pa'i kha zas za ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-7: nya de ni khyim bdag de'i pha yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-8: 'di ni khyim gyi rgyab na rdzing nya mang po zhig yod pa nas nya rnams bcus shing bcus shing zos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-9: mi de tshe 'phos pa dang nya de dag nyid kyi nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-10: de'i bu 'dis kyang lan brgya phrag du mar nya de bcus shing bcus shing zos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-12: yang du lan du mar skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-13: khyi mo 'di ni khyim bdag de'i ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-14: 'di yang chags pa'i zil gyis non pas su la yang sbyin pa'ang ma byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-15: tshul khrims kyang ma bsrungs par gyi nar rigs dang rgyud kyi don du rdzas rnams bsrungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-16: de'ang khyim 'di nyid la sems chags bzhin du tshe 'phos nas khyi mo der skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-17: de nas tshe 'phos nas kyang yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-18: yang du 'di nyid du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-19: khyim 'dir mi gzhan zhugs su dogs nas mtshan thog thag kyang khyim phyi skor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476a-20: mi de'i spang na 'dug pa'i bu de yang de'i chung ma'i byi bo yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-0: khyim bdag 'dis chung ma mi gzhan dang nyal bar @476b thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-1: khyim bdag de grong gzhan du 'gro ba ltar byas te khyim nas phyir byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-2: bud med de'ang mi gzhan dang nyal ba la khyim bdag 'di slar ldog ste mi de bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-3: de yang bud med de la chags shing sdug pa'i rgyus bud med 'di'i rum du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-5: pha gang yin pa de'i sha ni za /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-6: ma gang yin pa de la ni nya'i rus pa dang gra ma 'dor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-7: byi bo byed byed pa'i dgra bo khros pas bsad pa gang yin pa de ni pang du blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-8: de lta bas na 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'di la skyo bar bya ba'i rigs te ngo mtshar ni 'di che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-9: de nas dge slong moonggal gyi bu des phyi ma'i skye bo phal po che rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-10: de yi pha yi sha za zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-11: ma la rus pa gra ma 'dor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-12: chung ma'i byi bo gso byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-13: gti mug dang ni chags pas bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-14: gang zag 'di ni tshe zad la las ma zad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-15: de la gang zag la la las zad la tshe ma zad pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-17: gang zag sngar bde bar gyur la phyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-18: sngar sdug bsngal bar gyur la phyis bde bar gyur pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-19: gang zag de ni las zad la tshe ma zad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-20: de la gang zag las kyang zad la tshe yang zad pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:476b-22: gang zag gang sems can dmyal ba nas tshe 'phos te dud 'gror skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-0: @477a *// dud 'gro las tshe 'phos te yi dvags su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-1: yi dvags las tshe 'phos te lha ma yin du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-2: lha ma yin las tshe 'phos te mi'i nang du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-3: mi las tshe 'phos te lha'i nang du skye ba lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-4: gang zag de ni tshe yang zad la las kyang zad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-5: de la gang zag gang tshe yang ma zad cing las kyang ma zad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-6: de'i nyon mongs pa zad pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-11: dgra bcom pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-12: gang zag de ni tshe yang ma zad cing las kyang ma zad la de'i nyon mongs pa zad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-13: de la gang zag lus bde la sems mi bde ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-15: so so'i skye bo phal pa bsod nams byas pa ni lus bde la sems mi bde ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-17: yul ma ga dha'i bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-19: rgyal po man ta la sogs pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-20: gang zag 'di ni lus bde la sems mi bde ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-21: de la gang zag la la sems bde la lus mi bde ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-23: dper na dgra bcom pa ka ra ma sha lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-24: sems bde la lus mi bde ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477a-26: 'phags pa sho no ta ras tshe rabs snga ma la rang sangs rgyas khrus byed pa la ba lang gi lci ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-1: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-2: las ni shin tu stobs che ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-3: rdo rje lta bu'i las rnams las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-4: gang la bdag gi dbang byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-5: sdug bsngal ba yi las rnams myong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-6: zhes bya ba lta bu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-9: zan spyad de sbyin no snyam nas de la rings shig lon te dus yol bar zas byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-10: de yang las des tshe phyi ma la 'phags par gyur kyang snga dro bsod snyoms bslangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-11: dus yol la thug pa na zan rnyed pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-12: gang zag de lta bu ni sems bde la lus mi bde ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-13: gang zag la la lus kyang bde la sems kyang bde ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-15: 'di la dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bsod nams byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-18: rgyal po chos grags kyi bu lu ku ba lta bu sengge'i sgra sgrog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-19: de ni rab tu byung nas lo brgyad cu lon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-20: nam yang chung du na klad pa na ba tsam yang ma myong ngo zhes zer ba lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-21: de'ang sngon yul w'a ra n'a sir spos 'tshong zhig tu gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:477b-22: sangs rgyas log par dad sel nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan ba'i gsos sman phul ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-4: gang zag lus kyang mi bde la sems kyang mi bde ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-6: 'di la so so'i skye bo bsod nams ma byas pa dag rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-8: zas skom dang bral ba gzhan gyi khyim rgyu ba dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-14: g-yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyis yongs su gzir cing rkang lag med pa mig dang bral ba dag yod de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-16: de la gang zag las gang dang ldan na ngan song rnams su skyes kyang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lus snum zhing mdog 'tsher la mig tu sdug cing blta na dga' bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-18: gang zag gang 'dod chags las byung ba'i ngang tshul ngan pa dang ldan pa de ni ngan song rnams su skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-23: phya k'a ra na da pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-24: ngur ba la sogs pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478a-25: 'di ni gang zag las gang dang ldan na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-13: sha za la sogs pa lta bu'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-19: gang zag de ni gti mug las byung ba'i ngang tshul ngan pa dang ldan pas ngan song rnams su skyes pa ste; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-20: srog chags tshu tshun da ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-25: mang kun la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-26: lus la srin bu'i rigs nyi shu yod pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:478b-27: 'di ni gang zag las gang dang ldan na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479a-5: yid kyi las rnam gsum ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479a-7: srog gcod pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sa'i mdangs dang gzi byin nub par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479a-16: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479a-17: sa la rtsva dri nga ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479b-10: tshig kyal bar smra ba mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sa mtho dman dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479b-15: chags sems mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'bras dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479b-17: gro la sogs pa'i 'bras bu nyung zhing gra ma dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:479b-20: gnod sems mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:480a-0: @480a *// las de nyid kyi rnam par smin pas mthong na mi sdug par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:480a-7: de'i phyir rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe [?] til yod kyang til mar mi 'byung /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:489b-24: gzhan dag kyang bsod nams la rab tu 'god pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:489b-25: ston pa'i bstan pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:489b-26: phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:489b-27: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la nyam nga ba med par byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:489b-28: dma' ba'i sems nye bar gzhag par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-0: @490a *// bsod snyoms kyis yongs su dul ba'i dge sbyong gi phyogs la mun pa mad par snang ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-1: 'jigs pa med pa'i phan yon bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-3: 'jigs pa med par grong du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-4: 'jigs pa med par grong nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-5: 'jigs pa med par khyim rnams su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-6: 'jigs pa med par 'khor rnams la chos ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-7: 'jigs pa med par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-8: 'jigs pa med par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-9: 'jigs pa med par byams pa'i sems kyis slob ma'i gan du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-14: yo byad rnams yongs su spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-15: 'jigs pa med par kha ton 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-16: 'jigs pa med par tshe 'pho ba'i dus byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-18: de ltar na sems can rnams ni bdag gi las las gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-19: las kyi rgyu las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-20: las kyi skal ba la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-21: las la rten pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-22: sems can rnams ni las kyis rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-24: tha mar rnam par phye ba'o zhes ngas gang smras pa de ni 'di las dgongs te smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490a-25: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-0: bram ze'i khye'u shu ka @490b bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-1: de nas bram ze'i khye'us bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-3: khyod mnyan du yod par dge bsnyen gzhan dag gi khyim du gshegs par dgongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-4: bdag gi pha bram ze to'u de ya'i khyim du yang gshegs par dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-5: de ni bram ze to'u de ya'i khyim du yun ring po'i don du bde ba dang phan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-6: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas bram ze'i khye'u shu ka la gnang ba mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-7: de nas bram ze'i khye'u shu ka sa bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-8: rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gan nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-041:490b-9: las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so //
